alert.note: Alert for Central Chelan County; Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 15 at 6:33AM PST until January 18 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 8 and 14 inches possible for the valleys east of the crest. 2 to 3 feet of accumulation possible for the Cascade crest. * WHERE...Plain, Holden Village, Stevens Pass, Leavenworth, and Stehekin. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult especially for motorists going over Stevens and Blewett Passes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation at weather.gov/Spokane.

area.areaDesc: Central Chelan County; Western Chelan County
